3: Can I even stand before you and call you my sister anymore?
Will you... even want to see me?
Luna's heart fills with insecurity, but then she recalls the promise they made.
Wherever you are... Even if you become something else, I'll always be able to find you. I promise.
As Luna whispers her sister's name, a ray of comfort shines upon her weary heart.
But right at that moment, Luna feels the noise from the Ascension-Network beginning to fill her mind...
Why... Why is the power from the Network weakening?!
The condensed armor from the Punish Virus begins to weaken, causing Luna to fall to the ground.
I'm back to being like this...
Nearby Corrupted notice her and surround her from all sides.
Looks like they're treating me as a human since my power from the Ascension-Network has weakened...
What a pity, these mindless creatures... To think I almost became one of them.
Right as a Corrupted charges her, it gets sliced to pieces by an ethereal blade.
Luna closes her eyes and shakes her head.
I may not be able to guide you to a loftier existence, but... at least, with my guidance you needn't wander astray.
